references.paper_title: Latentformer: Multi-agent transformer-based interaction modeling and trajectory prediction
references.reason: This paper proposes a multi-agent transformer model for trajectory prediction, which is a relevant baseline for comparison in the field of autonomous driving motion generation.

references.paper_title: Chronos: Learning the language of time series
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel approach for time series modeling using transformers, which can be relevant to the task of motion generation in autonomous driving.

references.paper_title: nuplan: A closed-loop ML-based planning benchmark for autonomous vehicles
references.reason: This paper introduces a new benchmark dataset for autonomous driving planning, which is crucial for evaluating the performance of motion generation models.

references.paper_title: Multipath: Multiple probabilistic anchor trajectory hypotheses for behavior prediction
references.reason: This paper proposes a multi-modal motion prediction model using Gaussian mixture models, which is a relevant approach to compare against in the field.

references.paper_title: Rethinking imitation-based planner for autonomous driving
references.reason: This paper focuses on imitation learning for autonomous driving planning, which can be relevant to motion generation approaches that leverage imitation learning techniques.
